Overseas Compatriots Arrive 
   Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Delegates of the regional committees in Europe, the Commonwealth of Independent States and Canada to the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration arrived here Thursday to participate in the meeting for national reunification commemorating the 8th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
